    • execute

      public java.lang.String execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Perform the shooting action. If the gun is a shotgun, player will choose a direction to shoot. The actors that is in the shooting range of the shotgun have a chance to get hit and deal certain amount of damage. If the gun is a sniper, player will choose number of rounds to aim. The larger the number of rounds of aiming, the higher the accuracy and the damage dealt to the actor that is chosen by player
      Specified by:
      execute in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - Actor performing the action
      map - Map that is played on
      Returns:
      Describes what happened after the action
